original: Lech, Gillis Yngve William, fil. dr, lektor, Kalmar, f. 18/10/91 i Igelösa, Malmöh. 1., av kyrkoh. Per L. o. Linnea Nordström. G. 22 m. EHsabeth Lindgren. Barn: Carin f. 24, Gunnar 26. — Stud:ex. i Hälsingborg 09, fil. kand. i Lund 12, fil. mag. 14, fil. lic. 19, fil. dr 25. Vik. adj. i Halmstad part. 16, timlär. v. Lunds priv. elem:-sk. 18-20, e. lär. där 20-21, timlär. där 21 o. 22, ord. lär. där 22-32, lektor i modersm. v. Kalmar h. a. 1. sed. 32, vik. rektor under skilda period. 34-43. Suppl. i styr. f. Kalmar hand:inst. sed. 37, ordf. i Kalmar-avd. av fören. Norden 37-42. Skr.: Skånemålens böjn:-lära (grad:avh. 25), Skånskt bygdemål. Sagor, sägner, folklivsbilder (tills. ni. Ingers 30). RNO.
translated: Lech, Gillis Yngve William, Ph.D., lecturer, Kalmar, b. 18/10/91 in Igelösa, Malmöh. 1st, son of clergyman Per L. and Linnea Nordström. Married 22 to EHsabeth Lindgren. Children: Carin b. 24, Gunnar b. 26. — High school diploma in Hälsingborg in 09, Bachelor of Arts in Lund in 12, Master of Arts in 14, Licentiate in Philosophy in 19, Doctor of Philosophy in 25. Substitute teacher in Halmstad from 16, part-time teacher at Lund's private elementary school from 18-20, full-time teacher there from 20-21, part-time teacher there in 21 and 22, regular teacher there from 22-32, lecturer in native language at Kalmar starting from 32, substitute principal during various periods from 34-43. Board member of Kalmar Business Institute from 37, chairman of the Kalmar branch of the Norden Association from 37-42. Written works: Skånemålens böjn:-lära (thesis in 25), Skånskt bygdemål. Sagor, sägner, folklivsbilder (together with Ingers 30). Member of the Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences.
